channel.title: Sharing my first patch - Fonologia style
channel.description: Hi! Here is my first patch. it's a little generative thing loosely based on 1950s electronic music, in the RAI Fonologia style. I will add later some table players of random voice samples to complete it. The name celebrates the technician Marino Zuccheri who was the composers' and master technician of the Studio. have fun! .Zuccherofono.axp (29.0 KB) [Fonologia Pics](https://www.google.it/search?q=studio+di+fonologia+rai&biw=1242&bih=713&tbm=isch&tbo=u&source=univ&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjM2vSC2MXPAhXGLhoKHY2yDP4QsAQIWA)

item.title: Sharing my first patch - Fonologia style
item.dc:creator: @Tobor Giorgio Sancristoforo
item.description:
@Tobor wrote:

Hi!
Here is my first patch. it's a little generative thing loosely based on 1950s electronic music, in the RAI Fonologia style. I will add later some table players of random voice samples to complete it.
The name celebrates the technician Marino Zuccheri who was the composers' and master technician of the Studio.

have fun!

.Zuccherofono.axp (29.0 KB)

Fonologia Pics

Read full topic
item.source: Sharing my first patch - Fonologia style
